AppName: Viva Recorder Pro - Record Video With Background Music
Description:
-Record unlimited scene as you want
-Pause during recording
-Cut/Copy/Paste your videos after record
-Merge all you videos on the same screen

The easiest voice recorder ever!
The common choice of 60 millions users!

A new, modern design makes it even easier to capture and share personal notes, family moments, classroom lectures, work meetings, speeches, interviews and more. Also, It can help you learn languages easily.

Editing tools like trim and cut let you fine-tune your recordings. And use other more functions to do even more to help you work efficiently. 

Features:

Easy to Record

Choose audio formats such as mp3, m4a, AIFC, wav.
Choose sample rate（8-48KHz） and bit rate（64-320kbps）.
Plan your recording schedule.
Auto pause to record the sound you want.
Siri shortcuts support.

Easy to listen

Quickly find recordings with the search feature.
Jump 5 seconds forward or back.
Stop playback at the scheduled time.
Change speed.
